name: Fort Mortem
description:
Protect the burial grounds with your undead army!!
Select your allies with the mouse and place them on the field they will fight the oncoming warriors coming to desecrate the burial grounds.

Feedback in comments appreciated!!

Music Credits:

Music: “Pyramid Sands”, from PlayOnLoop.com
